name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Visioner for Screenshot Reading and Analysis

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Vision, AI screen screenshot image capture & reader, text writing & rewriting & optimization tool, analyzer, email assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of seamless integration with ChatGPT Visioner, the Chrome plugin designed to revolutionize your browsing and productivity experience. This versatile plugin captures screenshots of the active webpage and automatically inserts them into the ChatGPT conversation box for vision AI. Users can input prompts, which are automatically stored or retrieved, enabling ChatGPT to read and analyze the screenshot content to provide accurate responses. This plugin processes both image content and text within images, making it ideal for extensive text operations, stock and cryptocurrency chart analysis, and more.

Key Features:

1. Manual Selection or Full Screen Capture: Easily select specific areas of the webpage or capture the entire screen with one click.

2. Prompt Input and Management: Enter prompts, save them automatically, and manage your prompt list efficiently.

3. Seamless Integration with ChatGPT: Combine prompts with screenshots and get accurate responses from ChatGPT.

4. Retry and Refine: If you're not satisfied with the response, retry and regenerate until you get the desired answer.

5. Output and Save Conversations: Save entire conversation histories into Word files, with images saved separately.

6. Subscription Model: Enjoy a free 7-day trial for full feature access. Basic ChatGPT functions are available without a subscription.

ChatGPT Visioner â€“ Making AI work for you, one screenshot at a time.
